featured.text: Captivated by the utterly fantastic sights Langford described, Moran became eager to see this odd territory for himself.
In 1871, he was appointed to illustrate The Wonders of Yellowstone, a story by Nathaniel P. Langford, who had participated in an expedition to Yellowstone.
Its establishment was proposed by Langford.

definition.zh_def: 蘭福德，一個地名或姓氏，通常與英國的地區或人有關。
definition.en_def: Langford, a place name or surname, often associated with regions or individuals in England.
definition.example: Langford is known for its beautiful countryside and historic buildings.
